long_description: folkman law is a team of hardworking lawyers, paralegals, and staff dedicated to protecting our clients' rights. driven by a passion for justice and a commitment to seeing every client triumph, we will never hesitate to go the extra mile. we pride ourselves on providing exceptional legal services to individuals and businesses in a wide range of practice areas, including personal injury, employment law, business law, legal malpractice, and medical malpractice. our legal team combines top talent and decades of legal experience. we consistently exceed clients' expectations in delivering results-driven guidance. with an extensive record of six- and seven-figure case results — including a record-breaking $100 million personal injury verdict — we've earned a reputation for never backing down. with offices in cherry hill, new jersey and philadelphia, pennsylvania, folkman law serves clients throughout southern new jersey and southeastern pennsylvania.
